concept.cypher: MATCH (apiPackage:PACKAGE) WHERE apiPackage.FQN =~ ".*\\.api" SET apiPackage:API RETURN apiPackage
MATCH (implementationPackage:PACKAGE) WHERE implementationPackage.FQN =~ ".*\\.impl" SET implementationPackage:IMPLEMENTATION RETURN implementationPackage

constraint.description: API packages must not have dependencies to implementation packages.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (a:PACKAGE:API)-[:CONTAINS*0..1]->(p1), (i:PACKAGE:IMPLEMENTATION)-[:CONTAINS*0..1]->(p2), (p1)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(p2) RETURN p1 as apiPackage, p2 as implementationPackage ORDER BY p1.FQN, p2.FQN
